description:
Futurefulness
BEHAVIOUR · NUDGE · INNOVATION · LEADERSHIP 
In a worldwhere exponential changeisacceleratinghumanprogressandcreatingunexpectedopportunities, one of ourgreatestchallengesis to remaincentered on whatmakesushuman. 
An inspiring and challenging purpose that will take curious minds on a journey of exploration and discovery. 
Vertex will gather the world most innovative thinkers, leaders and experts to help redefine the future of business, technology, and humanity as a whole.
name: VERTEX2018
